title: Kevin Volland - Wikipedia
snippet: Volland gained prominence at the 2015 UEFA European Under-21 Championship where he was awarded the Silver Boot. After starting his football career with FC Thalhofen, Volland transferred to FC Memmingen's C-Youth squad, playing in the Bavarian League, the top amateur division at that time.
